DescriptionText.SourceString: The Moon stops you from exiting the house. "Back to bed!" He screams as he grabs you and everything fades to black.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: The Moon stops you from exiting the house. "Back to bed!" He screams as he grabs you and everything fades to black.

DescriptionText.SourceString: The thing pulls you to the Moon, who screams "Back to Bed!" Everything fades to black.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: The thing pulls you to the Moon, who screams "Back to Bed!" Everything fades to black.

DescriptionText.SourceString: The window is locked.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: The window is locked.

DescriptionText.SourceString: You unlock the window with the small key. Brrrrr... it's cold outside.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: You unlock the window with the small key. Brrrrr... it's cold outside.

DescriptionText.SourceString: The window is open. It's really cold outside.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: The window is open. It's really cold outside.

DescriptionText.SourceString: Wearing the Hedgehog Mask, you climb out the window.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: Wearing the Hedgehog Mask, you climb out the window.

DescriptionText.SourceString: You climb out the window.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: You climb out the window.

DescriptionText.SourceString: Your socks are nicely folded.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: Your socks are nicely folded.

DescriptionText.SourceString: A Deadeye Roxy Rodeo Hat. You wore this until it fell apart. Everyone loves Roxy.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: A Deadeye Roxy Rodeo Hat. You wore this until it fell apart. Everyone loves Roxy.

DescriptionText.SourceString: You put on the Hedgehog Mask.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: You put on the Hedgehog Mask.

DescriptionText.SourceString: You don't want to go to bed! Never again!
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: You don't want to go to bed! Never again!

DescriptionText.SourceString: There's a letter on the desk. "Dear Moon, can you bring back the Sun?"
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: There's a letter on the desk. "Dear Moon, can you bring back the Sun?"

DescriptionText.SourceString:
A toy phone rings. 
A child cries softly on the other end. 
"He never sees me..."
DescriptionText.LocalizedString:
A toy phone rings. 
A child cries softly on the other end. 
"He never sees me..."

DescriptionText.SourceString: You slowly open the closet.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: You slowly open the closet.

DescriptionText.SourceString: Something reaches for you from the darkness. You hear the knashing of teeth.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: Something reaches for you from the darkness. You hear the knashing of teeth.

DescriptionText.SourceString: A Hedgehog Halloween Mask! This can fool anybody!
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: A Hedgehog Halloween Mask! This can fool anybody!

DescriptionText.SourceString: You take the mask.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: You take the mask.

DescriptionText.SourceString: There is nothing in the closet anymore. The thing is gone.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: There is nothing in the closet anymore. The thing is gone.

DescriptionText.SourceString: You turn on the fan. Ahhhhhh. Nice.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: You turn on the fan. Ahhhhhh. Nice.

DescriptionText.SourceString: A Grand Prize Trophy. Stolen in the night from the Moon's bedroom.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: A Grand Prize Trophy. Stolen in the night from the Moon's bedroom.

DescriptionText.SourceString: The toybox is empty.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: The toybox is empty.

DescriptionText.SourceString: You find a Sharpay plushie inside.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: You find a Sharpay plushie inside.

DescriptionText.SourceString: The door is barred from the other side.
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: The door is barred from the other side.

DescriptionText.SourceString: You take the plushie and find a small key inside!
DescriptionText.LocalizedString: You take the plushie and find a small key inside!
